<Meta title="Templates/Actions/Create Document" />

# Create Document Action
 
```jsx
const CreateDocumentAction = (props) => withActionView({
	...props,
	title: <ResourceCreateViewTitle resourceName="Document"/>,
	ViewForm: CreateDocumentViewForm,
	submitLabel: 'Create'
}, () => null);
```
